msbt.message: Hiya! Having a great morning, pal?
Thank you for stopping to talk to me at this late hour!
Right now, I'm taking donations for .
Our goal is . Currently we have in donations, which is just lovely, isn't it?We still need . If you can spare even a single Bell, great! We appreciate your support, friend.
I see.<10_4 /> Well, I look forward to your support in the future, pal!
Well, I look forward to your support in the future, pal!

Because of you, we've reached our goal of !Next step, project completion. Great work, buddy!
Our project is no longer accepting donations. But thank you for your support thus far, pal.
